website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable concealer that provides full coverage that lasts all day.
pros: Offers a long-lasting matte finish without drying out skin
Easy to blend and offers great coverage for under-eye circles and other imperfections
cons: Many of the shades run a bit yellow, which isn't an ideal match for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Woah Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Jeffree Star recommended this on his youtube channel. It covers ridiculously well. I have incredibly deep/dark circles and this concealer makes me look airbrushed when layered over their foundation.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I have been paying for YSL concealer for years and while I love it, I wanted to try a (very) cheap alternative to save money. I'm completely satisfied with this concealer, it does a great job and the quality is honestly amazing. I have naturally dark circles under my eyes and this totally conceals them. It is definitely a heavier concealer but it sets well and doesn't smudge throughout the day. Highly recommend for beauty on a budget!!
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: True Beige
customer_reviews.text: I bought True Beige not knowing the color. It is almost orange. It didn't even match my friends with darker skin color. Don't recommend if you don't already know its a match. Nothing beige about it.
customer_reviews.author: amy allen

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is perfect product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an light skin African American and had some moles burned off by my doctor I acquired from prego but wasn't warned it would leave horrible scars on my beautiful neck! I'm currently using it's car repair cream but in the meantime was looking for the perfect concealer and I found it and couldn't be happier! I am so excited about this product and had to scrub it off with soap and water and a rag in order for it to move which was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, lasts, maybe a bit light for me. I wear Porcelain in the foundation and purchased fair in the concealor. Does the trick for covering up my racoon eyes though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alabaster vs Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: Alabaster (lighter) vs Vanilla (darker, orange undertone). I have a quite pale skin with greenish/bluish(olive?) undertone, that makes it difficult to find a product that won't look like pink or yellow patches on my face. At first I gave a try to Alabaster and it turned out to be too light for me (will keep it for winter), so I decided to get also a Vanilla. It is closer to my skin tone, but I wish it was less orange. I still can use it in summer or mix with the first one. I like the coverage and that it almost has no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Prelle

customer_reviews.title: Super drying formula
customer_reviews.text: I applied the product under my eyes with the provided applicator and used a damp beauty blender to attempt to blend it out. Even with the damp blender it was so dry and thick that it caked up and settled into my fine lines. I tried this product twice, both times resulting in removing it with makeup wipes and using a different product in it's place. Yes, I did prep my skin. Using under eye cream and a moisturizing primer. I wouldn't recommend this product at all... Especially with all the amazing concealers on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these at Ulta for around $8 and I bought these for $3.50 each! I thought that they might be a knockoff product because that happens sometimes on Amazon but these are legitimate! I'm fairly light so the color fair was a tad dark, but it completely works well! I would have liked it to be a little less yellow but it helps aid as a color corrector for dark circle cancelation!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my foundation, and its flawless! I use a babyface primer before, and it stays all day! Great quality and it lasts me a couple of months! For the price and the quality this is an absolute steal! love love love
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cole

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh
customer_reviews.text: I like NYX products. I have high end to low end beauty products. I ordered two colors to contour and the liquid concealer doesn't glide and blend as easy as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Caked, creased, and turned yellow
customer_reviews.text: This looked great the first hour I wore it. Within the second hour of wear it turned yellowish, casked, and creased. I had to wash my face mid-morning it was so bad. There was no change of lighting or anything during that time, it was if it took a really long time to settle and then the true tint came out as it did. This was a waste and not the quality that usually comes with NYX products.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Why you waiting?
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best concealer I have used. I purchased the vanilla (i am yellow bone) and looks perfect. My skin color changes with the seasons so I may buy the next two shades up. (I get dark people be amazed naturally no natural sun tanning or tanning booths. This product is a must purchase. Will make this my every 3rd month subcription.
customer_reviews.author: Cuban_tattooist

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: 1. If yu looking for a concealer that blends flawless STOP HERE AND BUY NOW 2. When picking your color if confused. Chose one shade darker than your first pick! Why because computer show the color a tad bit darker but it lighter than what it shows online. 3. Packaging is small and convenient for travel but product is more than enough to last 4. When using blot lightly rather than Pressed or wipe concealer into pores. 5. It lasts for hours without smearing off on pillow. If heavy sleeper take off before yu lay down. 6. To remove yu can use witch hazel or wipes, dont matter cause it removes easily
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very white
customer_reviews.text: The color Pale is much whiter than the picture and gives my eyes a racoon or owl look. The vanilla is a bit darker than my face. I have taken a picture of them on my hand with a paper-white background. However, it conceals very well and feels light against my skin. When I use this on my eyes I will blend it in with my regular concealer.
customer_reviews.author: N. W.

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Based Caramel, For hard to Match Complexion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the concealer Caramel, it’s a tad darker then my complexion but not by much. This is the first Caramel concealer that I have purchased that had yellow undertones rather the neutral or to my displeasure red. I love that!!! I have a unique skin tone do to being multiracial. So if you have yellow undertones and green undertones combined you might want to give this a try. It’s a plus for me because I abhor foundation, powder etc. I would rather have flawless skin, and so I only use this for under eye with a good moisturizer and for the must this happen? blemish.
customer_reviews.author: CamillaAstrid

customer_reviews.title: Drying, creasey
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the shades or formula for this product! I find that it is very drying and definitely makes for large creases when used under the eye. I feel like it’s pretty hard to blend due to the dry consistency it has. I was expecting more from this after seeing it sometimes being recommended as a dupe for a high end concealer, but it definitely did not live up to the hype for me. I have dry skin but obviously take necessary measures before applying in order to create hydration on my skin and regardless of the moisturizer/primer I use, it doesn’t work! I’m bummed but for the price I’m not shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My new fav concealer! Great coverage and easy to blend. I have not tried a cut crease with it yet, but I'm sure it'll stay put. Jeffree Star approved as well!
customer_reviews.author: ShyShy

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for dark circles under eyes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause I was looking for something to help cover the dark circles under my eyes. I have really bad dark circles and everything I try works for a short time then absorbs into the skin or something Cause it will look like I never used anything at all. I gave this a try and I use it for under eye concealer and for contouring and it works great for both. It is the best thing I’ve found to help hide the dark circles under my eyes. It lasts and covers very well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage, but colors are darker than the tube.
customer_reviews.text: Product is darker than it looks from the outside of the tube. Purchased Natural shade at a retailer, it is much more yellow/orange than the tube looks. Ordered Fair and Light Ivory. They are much lighter and less yellow. I am fair skinned and both of those colors work. Going to try Alabaster as well. The pictures under the product description help show the colors and undertones. Product is smooth and long lasting. Covers well, not very moisturizing...almost feels powdery. This product was recommended by a website that focuses on fungal acne and products that won't aggravate it.
customer_reviews.author: JaxMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Best over foundation, not under!
customer_reviews.text: I usually put my concealer under my foundation. I have always felt like that just gave me more coverage and looked more natural. With this concealer, that was not working and I was really hating how it looked. But over the foundation it looks amazing! Great coverage, fairly resistant to creasing, and brightens up foundation nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Coverage
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is significant, but looks best (in my opinion) if applied and blended on top of foundation. Helped conceal rosacea, but only for about 2-3 hours. Overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: peaceandsocialjustice

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Everything great about this product. No criticisms at all. Was looking for a very light color as a concealer but also to lighten under brow as a highlighter. This does everything well. It goes on smoothly, doesn't crease, doesn't wear off and dries quickly. I wish it came in a squeeze tube rather than an "applicator" style tube as I use this product with a concealer brush so have to put a dab of product on my hand and brush into it but that's a very small downside. Great product with a great price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this is a full coverage, buildable concealer without a cakey feel to it. I used setting spray as a primer before applying and dusted a very light layer or translucent powder before using this concealer (handly trick for those who deal with creasing issues under the eyes, or smile lines). I have quite oily skin which causes most concealers to crease about an hour after applying but doing the above mentioned technique with this concealer it stayed put all day and gave it a baked look without looking heavy. Definitely buying this concealer again!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer Ever
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is amazing! Great coverage and stays put all day. It takes very little product to cover imperfections and you can feel it setting as you blend. Finish it off with a little nyx setting spray and you don't have to think about it again. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Chick

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, but the color is a bit darker than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I absolutely LOVE the product! But as the title suggests, the color is quite off. It came out a bit too yellow/darker than what I wanted. Other than that it stays on the entire day, and does a wonderful job at concealing any imperfections. I really do recommend you to buy this if you're looking for that PERFECT concealer, but make sure to get the lighter one. For example, my skin would actually match with the Vanilla shade, instead of the True Beige; which is what I got.
customer_reviews.author: bun

customer_reviews.title: Best ever, just one tiny issue.
customer_reviews.text: Well this is probably one if the best concealers I’ve ever used. It does not cake or flake or sink into little lines in your skin. Very good coverage! I apply it with a flat foundation brush and it blend really well and does look “flawless”. The one and ONLY issue that I have (hence the four stars) is that it stings like a mother if you cry or tear up and it gets in your eyes. So don't cry while wearing this 😉.
customer_reviews.author: H.G.

customer_reviews.title: Similar to tarte shape tape
customer_reviews.text: Best drug store concealer I have found yet! Reminds me of Tarte shape tape but doesnt last as long. But who cares, you're paying a lot less for this. So unless you plan to wear your concealer for 12+ hours, go for this dupe.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh G.

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I used mostly warm caramel 15.7 with warm honey 15.9 right under the eyes for this look.. NO FOUNDATION! I find that foundation doesn’t flatter me so I’ve always went for alternatives and this is the new go to. I have very oily skin but this formula stays all day and has kept my frown lines from creasing longer than any other concealers I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to choose a color
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was taking a chance by choosing a color online. I purchased the golden as a contour color. I have light skin with pink undertones. This shade really doesn't work well for a contour color. I wish the product page had more help on which color to choose for contouring with certain skin shades.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Stays on long but settles into fine lines
customer_reviews.text: This concealer won't leave your face, that's for sure. I had trouble getting it off even with makeup remover. It's wayyyy to bright under my eyes and settled into lines I didn't even know I had (I'm only 25 for reference). I am very light skinned and the "fair" was wayyyyy to bright- I'm talking like noticeable from across the room bright. I was kind of skeptical before I purchased but yeah, find a different concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Elliotte McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw lots of mixed reviews on YouTube, but needed a new concealer and was on board for the price. I have very textured skin and I don’t feel like this wears bad (I use a beauty blender). I do have to touch up spots throughout the day, but it has good buildable coverage and is a decent undereye concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hurley

customer_reviews.title: It didn't settle in wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in the shade of fair. I used it primarily for highlighting cheekbone, forehead and chin areas and concealing dark under-eye circles. It blended very well and did not settle into my under-eye wrinkles, which is my primary complaint with other concealers. It lasted throughout the day. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: hcudahy@gnt.net

customer_reviews.title: Matched to a "T" perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing if it would match my skin tone or not. I lucked up and it matches perfectly. I didn't need to use anything else to enhance to blend. I use the applicator it comes with and blended with my finger and that's it. I don't wear foundation. This is perfect for where I need it for coverage. I plan on purchasing more from NYX. I love their makeup. This is all I use on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Meac

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Swatches
customer_reviews.text: Colors in swatch do not match the actual pictures. Buy this in person so you can swatch them. The online swatches are 2+ shades darker than the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: New favorite concealer! Great coverage and makes my under eye circles disappear! I prefer this over my Too Faced and Tarte concealer. a little goes a long way. I have combination skin and around my eyes are oil magnets! This concealer does not creases or get cakey, lasts all day & looks natural, but covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Del Real

customer_reviews.title: Blend it! Quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent more than I ordered, but I’m not complaining. The color I chose was a bit too dark and too warm to be used as contour for my face. This is one of the very few products I can use on my skin without breaking out. You have to blend quickly because this stuff dries fast and doesn’t budge!
customer_reviews.author: W. C.

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a LONG way
customer_reviews.text: I love all AFFORDABLE cruelty free makeup. I tried this because it was recommended for my dark circles under my eyes. Just the tiniest amount goes a long way. I’m looking forward to trying Nyx’s other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight perfect blending
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the correct shade. I have super fair skin with pink undertones so I originally ordered lighter so I don’t look weird, but eventually I got this one and it was great. It mixed / blended easily and well with my current products and created great contour for my face. The product will last much longer than I was originally expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Love the color match. I’m apart of the pale skin tone club, so finding something light enough that isn’t yellow is hard. This shade was perfect for me, the consistency and pigment was great. Blended out perfectly with a wet beauty blender, worked great with my MAC foundation. I would describe the concealer as a medium to full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Suvi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right tone!
customer_reviews.text: The product alone is amazing! The only thing I do recommend is that if it’s your first time ordering, to be careful. Due to Covid-19 I haven’t been able to go out and buy makeup at Sephora and decided it to buy it here without realizing that the tone is actually way off my skin color. OOOooOps.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I honestly would try another concealer. Once applied its difficult to smooth/blend out especially under eyes. It did nothing for coverage over acne scaring.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff lifetime user
customer_reviews.text: Nyx is already a fav drugstore brand. This concealer is very opaque. Lasts all day. Not too drying. I live it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaMUA

customer_reviews.title: So full coverage!! Worth it!! Shade Natural for olive undertones
customer_reviews.text: I have malessezia which is caused by living in super hot places which means there are A LOT of ingredients in makeup that I cannot use but this concealer is not one of them.! This concealer has no agents that promote malsezzia and I am a satisfied customer 🥰 Show your skin some love with this!
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy Doll 🍒

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Value for money....five stars A cheap concealer, and a good one. It’s not amazing but it’s perfect for a day to day look. I don’t wear tons of makeup since I’m home with my kids everyday, so I don’t like to buy expensive products. This one still covers up the rings around my eyes and makes me feel pretty
customer_reviews.author: Frances Zaccagnino

customer_reviews.title: Creases on oily under eye skin.
customer_reviews.text: The product went on beautifully but started creasing right away ... but my skin seems to be a little oily underneath my eyes. I prefer to use Garnier skin active clearly brighter for dark circles and then my foundation and then I put on just a little Maybelline Master concealer. This seems to work well for me. I cannot use powder as it is too drying. I set my makeup with ELF makeup mist. I have combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Denise S

customer_reviews.title: Longlasting with NO creases!
customer_reviews.text: I am fair skinned (red/pink undertones) and Alabaster was a perfect color for me if you like your concealer a bit lighter than your skin tone. Dries quickly. Does not crease. Full coverage. Matte finish, but does not make you look dry like most concealers in this price range. Wore it for a full day and overnight, and it was still there long after everything else wore off. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: czechosicilian

customer_reviews.title: seems very dry
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to lighten my under eyes but this product seems drying and doesn't move easily, it drys quickly use a heavy eye cream or it will cake bad.. I apply some concealer I had left over and put this on top to lighten. I would not buy again. I was surprised I had heard good review for NYX
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this concealer in two colors. One is lighter and the other is 3 shades darker than my skin tone. It blends and covers well and doesn’t break me out. The longevity isn’t as good as I’d like. Bottom line:For the price I recommend thes concealers.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all for me!
customer_reviews.text: It simply did not cover for me. I just finally used 4 coats of my regular makeup instead, which covered my flaws. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color is so off
customer_reviews.text: I choose the color I normally do and buying online is hit or miss. This was like halloween makeup white. Like I know with some contouring you could go two shades lighter but this was ridiculous ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon81

customer_reviews.title: Better than MAC
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer, blurs pores, covers blemishes, and best of all doesn't crease. I love this product and it has replaced my high end concealers.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: Great quality imo. However, I assume this only applies to the shade I got, it was quite yellow. I can only use this as under eye concealer because it is so yellow tinted. Although it works perfectly for the under eye area. Covers dark circles very well. I'll prob try a lighter shade to use on the rest of my face.
customer_reviews.author: August R.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product has great coverage. Texture begins as a liquid concealer but drys fast into waxy coverage. it requires quick application because it will dry within 2-3 minutes making it harder to blend. I love the results though, it’s not as dry as it make it seem. Does not cling to dry patches, but it’s Just harder to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Last all day and night
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. It matched perfect to my skin. I also used it for a primer for my eyeshadow and really this stuff is just the best. Last all day and night. Only thing is that it will sink into any fine lines you have
customer_reviews.author: Lewlew

customer_reviews.title: creamy, covers very well
customer_reviews.text: Have used many different types of cover up, all make up artists use buckets to cover problem skin. This one feels fresh, soft and does not rub off or disappear on skin. Foundation goes over very well and I am happy. Just three little taps under eyes is plenty coverage. I have to spend $ carefully, this was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Lensch

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I have very light discoloration under my eyes and have found this product not to add any more coverage than if I just use my foundation. If you have dark circles I doubt this will do anything at all. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this for middle aged under eyes
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Works perfectly for under eye I swipe under each area and Pat gently with a beauty blender sprayed with a moisturizing primer and it really helps with wrinkles and bags and just overall under eye wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Q.

customer_reviews.title: More sheer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this product, it looked too light. But when I applied it, it blended in with my skin color perfectly and covers up some redness in one area. I'll be using it whenever I use makeup and get to go out again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Covers my dark cirles and acne!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fair skinned and got alabaster. It has just enough yellow tone to cover my blue under eye, but still looks natural on my skin. For reference I use 105 maybelline fit me. Not as moisturizing as I would like, but I can add my own moisture to it.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I got lucky and picked a shade that matches my skin exactly and the price is great. I don’t have a lot of expensive or other concealers so I don’t really have anything to compare it to. All I can say is it blends easily, and is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not crease
customer_reviews.text: I use to wear nypro concealer in the shade toffee. This is a beautiful tone for my chocolate brown skin. I have to rebuy them every 3 weeks which is my only con. However, I do use 2 coats that do not crease unlike nypro concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer! It goes in light and smooth, provides great coverage, and best of all it doesn’t cake under my eye. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yeti

customer_reviews.title: Full Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky about makeup in general, everything settles into my wrinkles and never covers my redness. This is my favorite concealer. It lasts all day at work, doesnt settle into fine lines and is super full coverage. My new holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: B Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage not too thick or thin
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. A little on the thick side but easily spreadable and looks good. I like it a little thicker because the thinner ones don’t cover my dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: I picked the wrong color but
customer_reviews.text: I picked the wrong color but instead of getting rid of it I use it on my eye lids somtimes for a more natural looking eyeshadow, since I love cream shadows. Wears well and lasts long in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product I'm happy with. Does a little better job with a primer under but still good without. I picked a very light shade probly need one darker but I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy RN

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as good as I expected (hoped for) based on other reviews. I've found while coverage is adequate, it really only works if you dot it on then let partially dry on the skin before blending.
customer_reviews.author: M Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage! Not cakey
customer_reviews.text: Super full coverage. Love it for my dark circles and blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Kanderson

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the worse concealer.
customer_reviews.text: The color was way off, and I started getting oily shortly after applying so I won’t be ordering again. It’s also medium coverage and it’s light weight so that’s the only thing I like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Macym

customer_reviews.title: Too drying for fragile older 50 yo skin
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my 21 yo daughter too drying under my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shade warm caramel and it’s a nice color. I do have a deep complexion so I would’ve assumed a color with caramel in it would be slightly darker than it actually is but it’s workable(the color that is). As for the actual formula, it’s eh for me. I have dry skin so I do tend to moisturize before I do my makeup but this concealer really clung to my texture regardless. I think it’d look nice and blurred on someone with oily skin but I looked about 30 years older with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phelicia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good as a primer.
customer_reviews.text: I may have bought it 2 shades too light lol. I bought it to use under my eyes but it made the slight wrinkles under my eyes more pronounced. I use it as a primer on my eyelids now, makes the eyeshadow stick really well.
customer_reviews.author: MonyMon

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I gave this concealer so many tries. I tried applying it with my normal skin routine. However it looked like it smeared. So then I tried applying more powder and it just came out patchy. I tried it on several foundations, but nothing changed. I guess this item just isn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Iliana White

customer_reviews.title: CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: way too drying and doesn't stay om for long Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: esierra

customer_reviews.title: covers well
customer_reviews.text: This is the secound time I bought this product, it is terrific. Great coverage and smooth application. I started buying this product because I have some health issues in which I developed bad dark circles. I looked like I was up for days. After using this they disappeared .
customer_reviews.author: Luciano C. Carnicelli

customer_reviews.title: Good for Vampires But Not Mortals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I needed a very fair colored concealer. It definitely functions as a concealer that's not too heavy but still has good coverage, but the color was too light for anyone that isn't undead, and believe me, my skin tone is Casper-adjacent. Goth chicks will love this, but I can't realistically imagine it having a place in most people's Caboodle.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Nebula Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price, but terrible online color matching
customer_reviews.text: Terrible color match online, be sure to know upfront what color you want. Otherwise this product is awesome for the price. I add a little lotion to my skin before, and emu oil to make it last longer without flaking, but I have very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It looked dry when i first applied it, but it softened up after a while. I like it, but i think I'll get a shade or two darker next time. I ordered the warm honey
customer_reviews.author: Naomie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I know everyone gave this rave reviews but I didn’t find that it concealed the dark circles under my eyes any better than what I had been currently using.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this concealer. It really hides my dark circles. I also use it on my redness under a mineral veil foundation and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scheve

customer_reviews.title: turned me orange
customer_reviews.text: I got the natural, and it turned me orange. It did not cover up my dark under eye circles. It also rubbed off in about 30 minutes. Very disappointed because I read this was a great product on many websites.
customer_reviews.author: MyBryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This concealer really does last all day. I usually put a little facial oil on around my eyes with eye cream first then apply the concealer. This shade blends well and looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm don't waste your time or money. Went on like paste, couldn't even smooth it out. Crazy..
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brett

customer_reviews.title: Beauty product review
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t as moisturizing as I thought, it dries very fast and it may clump. Unless you blend as soon as you apply don’t let it sit for more than a minute. Other then that it covers pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Blendable
customer_reviews.text: I love how this blends out, it is not too drying like shape tape can be and the shade range is really nice as well. Good coverage, nice finish, and a good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Go to the store instead
customer_reviews.text: I picked vanilla based on NYX website charts and it’s waaaaaay lighter than expected. I bet it would otherwise be a fine product. But this color has no use for me, so I suggest going to the store first.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaT

customer_reviews.title: Quality concealer
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this concealer. When I got it I thought I got a too light shade, but it blends really good into the skin. You don't really need a setting powder for this but I use one anyway for added longevity. Almost full coverage but not quite. Overall a good quality concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so pale, that I rarely can find makeup light enough for me. However, the "pale" shade is way too pale for me!) It looks like white-out on my skin. It is pasty, too, and hard to blend. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DECENT concealer - but very little product in bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The concealer itself is decent and has pretty good coverage. Just keep in mind, there is very little product in the bottle and will not last very long if you happen to have more than just a small dot/pimple, etc. If you happen to have larger areas to conceal - acne, blemishes, etc, you may want to order more than one - or just another product that will stretch a bit farther.
customer_reviews.author: L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works great and perfect coverage. Light.
customer_reviews.author: Rr

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage and it feels light on my face
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Larney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical Nyx product- does the job and is totally fine for the price, but isn’t anything incredible. It’s darker than I wanted it to be as I’m pretty pale, but that’s not really a quality issue and more a shade range one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with the seller
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and the best concealer I have ever owned. However I was unhappy with the servive. The item was not shipped until a week after the date I purchased it. Had nothing to do with prime. It was not shipped out until a week later. Very unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Great value and coverage!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the price and quality of product! It lasts all day and just wish it came in a bigger size. Great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DY

customer_reviews.title: Great for Contouring!
customer_reviews.text: I got the darkest shade to contour and I think its actually too dark for me. That just shows that it will work for others with a complexion darker than mine. The formula isn't to watery and not to thick. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Rusha

customer_reviews.title: Hides everything!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like my magic. I use it under my eyes to hide dark circles. I think it took like 5 years off my eyes. A little goes a longggg way so start off with a little bit. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail drugstore concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST drugstore concealer. Literally. This is my 4th bottle because I can’t switch to any other. Perfect shade, great coverage, isn’t oily. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nohane Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Seller was great, but this product sucks for anyone over 20. Enhances any signs of aging you may have (age 36).
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic eyeliner and eyelashes really work!! They stay on all day.I highly recommend them!!! Great for any occasion and seller communications was fantastic!! And it came super fast.No longer worry about the sticky eyelash glue and trying to get them to stay on and in place.I really recommend this and will buy more when i run out
customer_reviews.author: DENISE DUNN

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: The stuff works really good. I will say the color was a lot lighter than expected but that's fine I actually just use less of it than I would with something darker.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Can't Stop Won't Stop Contour Concealer - Vanilla, With Neutral Undertone
product_meta.description: Color:VanillaPlay hide-and-sculpt with the new Can't Stop Won't Stop Contour Concealer. Available in 24 highly pigmented hues, this lightweight liquid won't transfer and has three major complexion musts covered. You can use the blendable, matte formula to camouflage imperfections, brighten up your face and contour those features to perfection. This creamy multitasker also delivers full coverage with a finish that lasts for up to 24 hours. Pair the longwearing concealer with its complementary Can't Stop Won't Stop Full Coverage Foundation shades to put your best face forward.
feature_bullets: COVER & CONCEAL: Conceal, brighten under the eyes, and highlight with NYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Concealer. Available in inclusive shades to match Can't Stop Won't Stop Foundation, this contouring concealer can go the distance

24 HOURS OF MATTE WEAR: This creamy contouring concealer delivers full waterproof matte coverage for 24 hours! Cover anything in confidence with this waterproof matte finished concealer that will go all day and night

FACE FROM FOUNDATION TO FINISH: Complete your makeup look with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup face products to aid in color-correction & coverage from blush, bronzer, foundations & contouring concealer to palettes powders & setting sprays
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
